Html:
Hi Mr Ohan,

I want to ask you about marker configuration file, there is a part that i don't know what is the function.



I've read your code at MarkerLayout program and that part is called status attribute,.
But i'm still confusing, because in MarkerLayout program the values is always 2 but in some of your example programs the values is 9

Can you explain to me ?



Thanks :D

Reza Adhitya

Actually, they are supposed to be 2. If it's greater than 2, it'll be ignored. 

I forgot to modify Toolbar.txt, but thanks for reminding me. 

I'll update it for the next release.

Ohan

thank you for your answer,

so if the value more than 2, the marker will be ignored by marker tracker?

i've tried with other values such 1, 3, ...,7,, 8, 9 and it seems have no difference when tracking the marker

The value is ignored, but not the tracking. It still tracks it.

Ohan
